pages.title: Statues
pages.text: $(l)Statues$() are craftable figures that generate a $(l)passive income$() of basic blocks. $(br2)Statues can be given a Minecraft in game name to have it render the player's skin.

Every statue has 5 random blocks to pick from for it to generate. Once picked, the block cannot be changed. $(br2)The $(l)drop rate$() of a statue can be accelerated by adding an $(l)Acceleration Chip$(). A maximum of 10 Acceleration Chips can be added to each statue.
